column1: The Pit Room////Super friendly and helpful staff. New
column2: clean atmosphere. Fatty brisket is really good
column3: and venison sausage has great flavor. It is drier than your typical pork sausage
column4: but that's to be expected from the leaner meat. All the sides are homemade
column5: and the potato salad and Mac n cheese were fantastic. A few beers on tap (including Shiner) in the restaurant
column6: or take your food next door to the bar for over 30 beers on tap and 20 types of whiskey.
